mapper.insert: insert into QDXC (XCRW_ID, XCRW_DWMC, XCRW_DWBH, XCRW_DWID, XCRW_BMMC, XCRW_BMBH, XCRW_BMID, XCRW_TBR, XCRW_TBRID, XCRW_TBRQ, XCRW_FILE, XCRW_WFID, XCRW_NOTE, XCRW_DJBH, XCRW_XCLX, XCRW_QQZH, XCRW_XCFX, XCRW_KSSJ, XCRW_JSSJ, XCRW_XCRY, XCRW_CPHM, XCRW_LX, XCRW_ZT) values (#{xcrwId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcrwDwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcrwDwbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcrwDwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcrwBmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcrwBmbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcrwBmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcrwTbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcrwTbrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcrwTbrq,jdbcType=DATE}, #{xcrwFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcrwWfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcrwNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcrwDjbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcrwXclx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcrwQqzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcrwXcfx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcrwKssj,jdbcType=DATE}, #{xcrwJssj,jdbcType=DATE}, #{xcrwXcry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcrwCphm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcrwLx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcrwZt,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select XCRW_ID, XCRW_DWMC, XCRW_DWBH, XCRW_DWID, XCRW_BMMC, XCRW_BMBH, XCRW_BMID, XCRW_TBR, XCRW_TBRID, XCRW_TBRQ, XCRW_FILE, XCRW_WFID, XCRW_NOTE, XCRW_DJBH, XCRW_XCLX, XCRW_QQZH, XCRW_XCFX, XCRW_KSSJ, XCRW_JSSJ, XCRW_XCRY, XCRW_CPHM, XCRW_LX, XCRW_ZT from QDXC where XCRW_ID = #{xcrwId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
